definition: Myanmar (formerly Burma) (abbr. for 緬甸|缅甸[Mian3 dian4])

sentences.english: Yesterday I travelled to the Bangor State Fair in Maine.
sentences.chinese: 我於昨天前往緬因州班戈農牧產品交易會。

sentences.english: In this part of coastalMaine you couldn't avoid boats.
sentences.chinese: 在緬因州的這片海岸，你想看不到船那是不可能的。

sentences.english: Maine is the only state that has a one-syllable name.
sentences.chinese: 緬因州是唯一一個單音節名字的州縣。

sentences.english: In the summer of 1983, the governors met in Portland, Maine.
sentences.chinese: 1983年夏天，各州州長們聚集在緬因州的波特蘭。

sentences.english: I was on the Maine Turnpike when you beeped me.
sentences.chinese: 你呼我的時候，我還在緬因州的收費公路上呢。

sentences.english: I grew up in a small fishing village in Maine, surrounded by family.
sentences.chinese: 我在緬因州的一個小漁村裏長大，一直和家人在一起。

sentences.english: In Maine, boiled lobster is popular with local citizens and travelers.
sentences.chinese: 在緬因州，當地人及旅遊者都喜歡喫水煮大龍蝦。

sentences.english: Brendan was born in Canada and grew up in Maine .
sentences.chinese: 布萊登是在加拿大出生卻是在美國緬因州長大的。

sentences.english: White writes to his stepson in 1964 from his farm in Maine.
sentences.chinese: 懷特在他緬因的農場裏寫信給他的繼子說。

sentences.english: In Maine, almost 75 percent of all exports are sent to the Asia-Pacific Region.
sentences.chinese: 在緬因州的全部出口中，有75%是銷往亞太地區的。

sentences.english: Autumn winds stop a girl on a sidewalk in Portland, Maine.
sentences.chinese: 秋風使一個小女孩停留在緬因州波特蘭市的人行道上。

sentences.english: The autumns in Beijing and in Maine are very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 北京和緬因的秋天都很美。

sentences.english: The " Remember the maine" of Spanish war days has now been changed to "Remember Pearl Harbor.
sentences.chinese: 是“牢記緬因河”，如今已換成“牢記珍珠港”了。

sentences.english: Thunder Hole is a must-see in Maine's Acadia National Park.
sentences.chinese: 雷鳴洞是在緬因州的阿卡迪亞國家公園必須看的景點。

sentences.english: The previous record-holder was also a Maine Coon cat.
sentences.chinese: 先前的紀錄保持者是一隻貓也緬因州。

sentences.english: She works at the University of Southern Maine and studies psychological contagion.
sentences.chinese: 她在南緬因大學做心理感染的研究工作。
